name: airdrop
description: Used to convert XPR state file to airdrop files
author: Flare SC team

scripts.airdrop_default: yarn ts-node scripts/createAirdropGenesisDataFile.ts --snapshot-file files/export.csv --genesis-file files/go/genesis_scdev_airdrop.go --override -h true
scripts.airdrop_test: yarn ts-node scripts/createAirdropGenesisDataFile.ts --snapshot-file files/example.csv --genesis-file files/go/genesis_scdev_light.go --override -h true
